description: Holding a Ph.D. in Environmental Science from Stanford, Dr. Greene has always been a passionate advocate for eco-conscious innovations. His visionary leadership is the bedrock on which NaturaTech stands.
Aisha, with her background in bio-engineering, is the mastermind behind the cutting-edge technologies at NaturaTech. She believes in harnessing nature's wisdom to address modern challenges
Carlos, an alumnus of Design Academy Eindhoven, combines minimalism with bio-inspired designs, making NaturaTech's products not only functional but also aesthetically appealing.
Lydia's expertise lies in sustainable supply chains. She ensures that every step in NaturaTech's operations is ethical, green, and efficient.
Jamal, a former environmental studies professor from Yale, curates and oversees the rich tapestry of courses offered by EcoLearn, spreading eco-awareness across the globe.
